abstract: Donald Trump is lobbying New York City to allow him to expand Trump Golf Links at Ferry Point in Bronx to East River, plan already rejected by Mayor Bill de Blasio; city's parks department has presented alternate plan to convert waterfront land into publicly-accessible wildlife park.

headline.print_headline: Trump and City at Odds Over Expansion of Bronx Golf Course
headline.main: With Trump Proposal to Expand Bronx Golf Course, Some See Red, Not Greens

keywords.value: Trump Golf Links at Ferry Point
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Trump Organization officials have laid out a vision for a new and improved golf course and a 19.5-acre tract that it says it would turn into a wildlife sanctuary. The city wants a different plan....
lead_paragraph: Trump Organization officials have laid out a vision for a new and improved golf course and a 19.5-acre tract that it says it would turn into a wildlife sanctuary. The city wants a different plan.
